tool.name: M.tb VCF Report
tool.description: Annotate SnpEff VCF with links to Combat TB Explorer database
tool.command: ln -s '$input_vcf' data.vcf && tbvcfreport generate data.vcf && mv data.html '$output'
tool.help: This tool generates an HTML-based M.tuberculosis VCF report from an input SnpEff VCF file. The input has to be a SnpEff generated VCF file.
